name: Red Dead Redemption 2
title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Red Dead Redemption 2 is an epic tale of life in America at the dawn of the modern age. Developed by Rockstar Games, the game is set in 1899 and follows the story of Arthur Morgan, a member of the Van der Linde gang, as he navigates the decline of the Wild West. The game combines immersive storytelling, a massive open world, and stunning visuals that redefine the action-adventure genre.
features: Massive open world with dynamic weather and ecosystems
Deep, emotional story with complex characters
Realistic horse mechanics and travel system
Engaging side missions and random world events
Multiplayer experience in Red Dead Online

system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB

name: Elden Ring
title: Elden Ring
description: Elden Ring is an open-world action RPG developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. Set in the dark fantasy world of the Lands Between, the game was created in collaboration with fantasy novelist George R. R. Martin. Players take on the role of a Tarnished warrior exploring vast landscapes, uncovering deep lore, and battling powerful foes in a non-linear world.
features: Vast open world with seamless exploration
Dynamic day/night cycle and weather system
Challenging combat inspired by Soulsborne games
Deep lore created with input from George R. R. Martin

system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 3 GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4 GB
